_sText:
Italian Alps.
The Mafia is hiding weapons and incriminating documents in an old fortified farm, which was also used as a military bunker during WWII.
They're hiding the real purpose of the place with a wine shop business called "carpe diem". 
The police has sent a squad to take control of the place. The maffia should destroy all evidences 
and weapons before the police can grab them. 

*****************

This map is a defuse / quick-action level, with multiple ways to go to objectives (about a dozen), which make it very interesting to play. In fact the gameplay has been tested on our server during many months, and  the map "life expectancy" is great.
Try it, you'll love it. 

This map is the final version of "mini_suxor_pro"

It's also available  in gg version. Search for "gg_carpediem_arena".

*****************

34 slots available. No HDR.


Author : -|CarpeDieM|- Pit' - August 20008
Web : http://carpediemcss.free.fr
